heading: HB01667
0: AN ACT PROVIDING FREE AND SUITABLE PUBLIC EDUCATION FOR DIFFERENTLY-ABLED CHILDREN AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
mother-bill statusstatus: Approved by the House on 2019-05-27, transmitted to the Senate on 2019-05-28 and received by the Senate on 2019-05-28 Substituted by HB09104
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB01667
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING FREE AND SUITABLE PUBLIC EDUCATION FOR DIFFERENTLY-ABLED CHILDREN AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
ABSTRACT : Aims to provide free education for the differently-abled during their formative years in order to integrate this important sector into the social, political, economic and cultural mainstream of our society.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : REVILLA, STRIKE B.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-18
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Welfare
